section.p: You wait outside, hoping to take the repulsive ones singly as they emerge. You will have to fight the three of them, but you may do so one at a time.
Subtract 1 from your dice rolls for every fight because you are unused to underwater combat. [Their Defence scores have been raised by 1 instead --Ed]
If you beat all three, . If you lose, your adventuring days are over, unless you have a resurrection deal.
